fields.headline: Wheelchair-friendly UK tour
fields.bodyText: · The following organisations should be able to provide you with some information and advice: Holiday Care Service (0845 1249871). Tripscope (08457 585641). A number of youth hostels have wheelchair access. I have stayed in St Pancras Youth Hostel right opposite St Pancras station in London, and Oxford Youth Hostel also right next to the railway station. Details from the Youth Hostel Association (customer Services 0870 7708868, reservations 0870 7706113). Zem Rodaway · If you have advice or questions, please email: ask.a.fellow.traveller@theguardian.com, or write to: Ask a fellow traveller, The Guardian, 119 Farringdon Road, London EC1R 3ER.
